tool_description: Creates low-fidelity wireframes based on app requirements and target device specifications, establishing basic layout structure and navigation flow.

app_type.description: Type of application: social, ecommerce, productivity, gaming, utility

screen_count.description: Number of unique screens to wireframe (1-50)

navigation_style.description: Navigation pattern: tab-based, drawer, stack, modal

content_areas.description: Main content areas: header, footer, sidebar, main-content, toolbar

error_messages: Invalid app type: Use one of [social, ecommerce, productivity, gaming, utility].
Screen count out of range: Provide a value between 1 and 50.
Unsupported navigation style: Use one of [tab-based, drawer, stack, modal].
Invalid content area: Use valid area names [header, footer, sidebar, main-content, toolbar].
usage: Provide app type, screen count, navigation style, and content areas. The tool generates wireframe layouts showing structural arrangement of UI elements.

wireframe_layouts.description: Wireframe layout descriptions for each screen

navigation_flow.description: Description of navigation flow between screens

layout_specifications.description: Detailed specifications for each layout element
